summary: Alex and Sam plan a surprise visit to their favorite cousin, navigating travel arrangements and gift preparations before finally reuniting with their family.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: Hey Sam, I was thinking about my favorite cousin's birthday next week.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: The one who lives in the eastern part of the country?

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: Yes! I visit my grandmother there too. What if we surprise them both?

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: That's a great idea! Will you book the flights?

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: I already checked the website. There are some good options.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: Perfect! Let's plan the trip and prepare the gifts.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: We can plan everything from your comfortable sofa.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: Did you visit that website for the best flight deals?

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: I'll do that tonight. What should we get as a gift?

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: What about that model airplane she wanted?

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: Perfect choice! She'll love it. And some sweet juice for grandma.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: Don't forget my friendly uncle from the east will be there too.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: Oh right! He's the group leader for those hiking tours, isn't he?

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: Yes! He knows lots of fun activities.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: This trip is going to be amazing. I can't wait!

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: Did you book the tickets yet? We're leaving in three days.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: I'm trying to, but the website keeps crashing. It's much worse than before.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: Let's grab a taxi to the travel agency instead.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: Good idea. Grab my keys, they're on the table.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: Got them. We should avoid the traffic on the busy motorway.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: I know this direct route to the base of town. It's faster.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: The travel agent has sent me a message.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: What does it say?

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: The travel agent says there's an issue with our booking.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: What? She booked a hotel but not our flights?

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: She avoided the question about the flights. I'm worried.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: I'm expressing my feelings about this clearly. This is unacceptable!

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: Wait, she's checking something... We might be an inch from disaster here.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: That was close! I can't believe she found us tickets.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: An outstanding performance by that agent. She admitted her mistake.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: We just need to sign the documents.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: Ok, I'll sign below. Will you sign it too? It needs both our signatures.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: We will survive this travel chaos. Let's print the tickets now.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: Did you hide the birthday gifts?

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: Yes, underneath several plastic bags.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: Great, now let's start our adventure!
